title: Hawaii
description: In February 2019 my wife and I went to Oahu to present at the ComputEL workshop.

photos.description: A palm and a sunrise. Jet lag and time zones meant we were awake at 4 AM, so we went for a hike from our hotel to Diamond Head.
photos.alt: A tall palm three with the rising sun in the background.
Mountains in the distance past the ocean during sunrise.

photos.description: Some chickens and chicks that were wandering around the parking lot for Manoa falls.
photos.alt: A chicken and two chicks looking for food on a forest floor.

photos.description: Some viney things climbing up a tree.
photos.alt: A vertical view of leafy vines growing up a tree.
A small stream of water taking a small drop off a rock.
